string-array.name: short_content_recipes_array
string-array.item: Essential crepe recipe. Sprinkle warm crepes with sugar and lemon, or serve with cream or ice cream and fruit.
This fancy almond-flavored tea cake, also called \'Battenberg\/Battenburg Cake\' or \'Battenberg\/Battenburg Square\' features a homemade marzipan.
Oreos, cream cheese, and white chocolate chips are a match made in dessert heaven.
This will RUIN you for all other ice cream sandwiches.
Use your favorite kind of cake!
